contents.name: PerLengthDCLineParameter_capacitance
contents.description: Capacitance per unit of length of the DC line segment; significant for cables only.

contents.name: PerLengthDCLineParameter_inductance
contents.description: Inductance per unit of length of the DC line segment.

contents.name: PerLengthDCLineParameter_resistance
contents.description: Resistance per length of the DC line segment.
